messages.title: Anthony's vision for Anglesey:
messages.content: Anthony’s vision for Anglesey is that it becomes an energetic and entrepreneurial island with a can-do spirit in charge of its own destiny.

messages.title: Ynys Môn Needs Change
messages.content: We need a thriving local economy and more of the decisions that affect the island made on the island.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Favors low taxes and free trade. Wants to unlock the potential for renewable energy and harness the natural resources of Anglesey.
Supports farmers against costly red tape, plans to promote Anglesey produce.
Emphasizes improvement of education and skills to get higher paying jobs.
Aim to protect the natural beauty and support renewable energy resources.
Promises to get a better deal for Anglesey's public services.
Highlights the necessity for better roads and reliable mobile and broadband connectivity.

issues.economy: Better roads, mobile and broadband, fighting local businesses' corner, against Labour's 'attack on small business'.
issues.education: Supports the Welsh language, making sure children get skilled to get higher paying jobs.
issues.environment: Harnessing potential for renewable energy, protecting natural beauty, supporting tidal flow energy.
issues.health: Anthony has been campaigning for a vascular centre.

leaflet.personalStatement: Anthony is fighting to get the best deal for Anglesey with a strong track record of campaigning for improvements and services.

contactInformation.address: 22 High Street, Llangefni, Ynys Môn, LL77 7NA

endorsements.endorsement: Anthony is the strong local champion that Ynys Môn needs.

quotes.text: Low taxes, free trade, support to start and grow your business.

images.caption: Anthony visiting an Anglesey sheep farm

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet emphasizes change required under Labour and Plaid's agenda, critical of their economic foresight.
